txt.en: You feel an unnatural chill in the air
The Uch-lûth received the gift of the Grey Company, but still do not trust you fully.

'Grufudh says that your friends sent medicine and furs for trade... it is a good demonstration of trust, but our trust is not so easily earned. Too much dwells in this land that we do not understand... many evil spirits.

'Just last night, I was seeking a lost goat and saw what I believe was a Cuthraul, an evil spirit, floating in the air near Gwyllion's Gate. The Old Woman of the Mountain who lives beyond that pass is a strange creature, so the sight of such a spirit was not surprising, but I fear its presence.

'Will you seek evidence that what I saw was not just my imagination? If the Cuthraul appears, will you be able to banish it? Gwyllion's Gate lies south from here. I have only seen the spirit at night.'

<rgb=#FF0000>Some creatures may only be found at night; however, the first stage of this quest may be advanced during the day.</rgb>
Gwyllion's Gate lies to the south of Gavar Cadlus.\n\nRhiain has asked you to seek evidence of the Cuthraul's presence and to banish the spirit if you may.
'You are glûs -- holy -- Duvodiad! None of our folk have ever been able to banish the Cuthraul... we praise you, Glûs Duvodiad!'
Cuthraul have appeared at Gwyllion's Gate, to the south of Gavar Cadlus.\n\nRhiain sked you to banish the Cuthraul if you can.
Rhiain is at Gavar Cadlus, north from Gwyllion's Gate.\n\nYou should return to Rhiain with tidings of your success.
'The Cuthraul are fearsome spirits of folktales... now they are come to life!'
'The Cuthraul are fearsome spirits of folktales... now they are come to life!'
'Our legends tell that the Cuthraul haunt places where someone died violently... you are brave to go to those places and face the evil!'
Seek evidence of the Cuthraul at Gwyllion's Gate
'It is said the blood of the innocent draws the Cuthraul like moths to a flame... who died in these lands, I wonder?'
You found the evidence Rhiain requires
Talk to Rhiain at Gavar Cadlus
